page.title: 06HOME LIFE_WEEKDAY
page.content: A TYPICAL{WEEK DAY}FOR ME STARTS WHEN I GET READY FOR SCHOOL IN THE MORNING. MY BROTHER AND I HAVE TO BE UP EARLY AS MY MUM HAS TO GO WORK. THEN I GO TO SCHOOL.AT SCHOOL WE DO MATHS OR ENGLISH MOST DAYS AS WELL AS GAMES,ART AND SCIENCE.WE WATCH T.V. OCCASIONALLY.WHEN I COME HOME AT DINNER TIME I USUALLY GET MY OWN MEAL TO HELP MUM THEN I LIKE TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL EARLY SO THAT I CAN PLAY WITH MY FRIENDS BEFORE AFTERNOON SCHOOL BEGINS.AT 3.30,I COME HOME,GO TO MY ROOM,CHANGE INTO MY OLD CLOTHES AND GO OFF TO PLAY FOOTBALL.SOMETIMES I GO FOR A BIKE RIDE WITH MY FRIEND.WHEN I COME IN I USUALLY WATCH T.V. AFTER MY TEA ON A MONDAY I HAVE TO GET READY FOR SWIMMING.ON TUESDAY AND THURSDAY I GO TO JUDO.ABOUT NINE O'CLOCK I GO TO BED,AFTER I HAVE HAD A CUP OF TEA.
